sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: These Pathfinders know some paths are twisted and mad.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Pathfinder Chronicler/Pathfinder Chroniclers/Mad Prophet/Talminus the Esoteric

sections.body: Talminus believes the religions and cults of the past favored modes of thought that offer more truths about the nature of the universe than the uninspired religions popular today. Obsessed with discovering and understanding these cults' ancient beliefs, he desires to disseminate their teachings and herald a return to their profound truths.
